title: R-Drive Image 4.3 Build 4311 Portable
description:
R-Drive Image v4.3 Build 4311 made Portable.

No need to install it!

Or, if you want to, Setups and Serial are included. Be aware only that the license works only with the 4309 Build, but you can always install the 4309 and update it later to the new version, just running the other Setup.

The Package contains also a first version of the program made portable with the batch file that launches the program converted to an EXE with QBFC to avoid showing the relative DOS window, but that some AVs see sometimes as a virus. If your AV is one of them, or if you don&#039;t trust too much to it, use the second one that runs directly the batch file. You will have the sloppy DOS window in the background but less complaints from antiviruses...


Enjoy and remember to seed... :o)
